fields.bio: I was born the GOAT and intend to die that way. I chose the accompanying image to define me because even though the man is wearing a blazer, hes always wearing shorts. It's a symbol for the duality of man is his expression â€” a blend of genuine pain and outrageous pleasure. This lackadaisical formality and ambiguous overflow of emotion is what I hope to convey in this book club

Leading a book club with Daniel when we're reading his own book might have been a grave, grave mistake. I chose the accompanying image to define me because the color of her phone case, kimonoesque blouse, watch strap, coffee, earrings all match. That, to me, is art.
fields.favorite_book: The Script for Beatle Juice: The Musical
